attributes.action: To give ozzy osbourne, Tony Iommi, bill ward and geezer butler a knighthood
attributes.additional_details:
Because they need to be recognized for the joy they have brought to millions of people around the world. 
They have helped people with their music who go through difficult times. They’ve helped people have a better life. 
They created a genre of music. What other musicians have done that in the past 60 years? 
Even the Beatles and sir Paul McCartney or sir Rod Stewart haven’t even done that.
attributes.background:
Give these guys a knighthood for services to music. They created a genre of music. A genre that has influenced millions of people and made their lives better. They’ve influenced countless bands who in turn have brought joy to millions. 
They’re an institution.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions that ask for people to be given an honour.

The Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
